attributes.additional_details: To issue rationing in all supermarket chains. So that there is enough supplies to go round for everyone. E.g hand soaps , dried goods, long life milk, formula milk, toilet rolls, paracetamol. Something needs to be done to control this disaster.
attributes.background:
We need to start rationing products during the covid-19 crisis. The very people who are most at risk are the people who are missing out in the shops, because it’s been bought and they can’t afford to stock up. 

We need to start rationing to help the nation.
